attributes.action: STOP  THE HALF A MILLION CARERS IN THE COUNTRY FROM LIVING UNDER THE POVERTY LINE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THIS PETION IS FROM THE HALF A MILLION PLUS CARERS FOR HAVING TO LIVE THE POVERTY LINE AND SAVING THE N.H.S BILLIONS EVERY YEAR PROVIDING CARE FOR SIBLINGS, PARENTS, HUSBANDS, WIVES,PARTNERS. MOST CARERS WORK OVER 100HRS A WEEK AS TAKES FOREVER TO GET RESTBITE CARE AND THIS IS BREACHING EUROPEAN WORK GUIDELINE SET OUT BY THE DIRECTIVE, ALSO IF THE GOVERMENT ARE SO PROUD OF THE MINIMUM WAGE I BEG TO ASK THE QUESTION WHY ARE THOUSAND UPON THOUSANDS HAVING TO USE THERE SAVINGS AND ONLY GETTING APPROX; £46 PER WEEK TO BE A FULL-TIME CARER AND RECEIVING THIS DEMEENING AMOUNT OF MONEY. PLEASE SIGN YOUR NAME TO SHOW YOUR DIGUST AND VOTE OF NO-CONFIDENCE IN ALL THE POLITICAL PARTIES AS NOT ONE OF THEM DARE TO ADDRESS THE ISSUE OF CARERS AND THE AMOUNT OF MONEY THE DO NOT RECEIVE.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
